title: Java Script - which font?
content:
The attached image (see attachment) shows Java Script text, I believe.

But what's the font?

Thanks for any help!

I'm sure it's a very basic question, but any tips would be highly appreciated :)

Font: 

 Vera Sans Mono 

Solved By: 

 [Quellcrist](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025118/http:/typophile.com/user/218783 "View user profile.")

author: Thomas Emil

comments.content: Vera Sans Mono i think from the Gnome Project [http://www.gnome.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20140406025118/http:/www.gnome.org/ "http://www.gnome.org") originaly a Bitstream font if i m not mistaken
Thanks a lot for your help and quick reply!
